name: Intelligentsia i ty
description:
The final product of a school project involving the title question of 'What are the ideas and who are their thinkers that ultimately culminated in the Russian revolutions?'

You travel back to the year of 1861 Siberia and encounter the exiled revolutionary Mikhail Bakunin. It's also possible to debate against him on some fundamental political/philosophical questions concerning theology, the purpose of the state and freedom. That's about all... This is my first attempt at using Ren'py so the game contains limited features. 

Thanks for playing

- Vigilius Xaufniensis 'Creator'
